html: Hank Green's book An Absolutely Remarkable Thing is the best book I've ever read about the social Internet--and also a roaring adventure story. It comes out September 25th, and it's brilliant. Preorder it at http://hankgreen.com !

html: It's Esther Day! Since August 3rd 2010 this has been a day to celebrate love for family and friends and tell those we are close to that we love them, even if it is sometimes difficult to say out loud. Let someone know you love them today and every day! https://www.tswgo.org/esther-day pic.twitter.com/mGn4lxWrr5
text:
It's Esther Day! Since August 3rd 2010 this has been a day to celebrate love for family and friends and tell those we are close to that we love them, even if it is sometimes difficult to say out loud. Let someone know you love them today and every day!

html: Esther would be--should be--24 years old today, navigating the treacherous waters of early adulthood. I miss her, as so many people do. But I also see her work and love continuing through her family and @tswgo. I'm grateful to them, and to everyone who shares love on Esther Day.
text: Esther would be--should be--24 years old today, navigating the treacherous waters of early adulthood. I miss her, as so many people do. But I also see her work and love continuing through her family and @tswgo. I'm grateful to them, and to everyone who shares love on Esther Day.

html: Happy Esther Day. Before she died in 2010, Esther Earl asked us to remember her birthday with a celebration of love among family and friends. And so every August 3rd, people around the world take a moment to say "I love you" to those they care about.
text: Happy Esther Day. Before she died in 2010, Esther Earl asked us to remember her birthday with a celebration of love among family and friends. And so every August 3rd, people around the world take a moment to say "I love you" to those they care about.
